content: Sabrina Marczakâs Website Â Â Â Â Sabrina Marczakâs Website Â Welcome to my website! My name is Sabrina Marczak. I am a Senior Instructor and a Research Associate at the PontifÃ­cia Universidade CatÃ³lica do Rio Grande do Sul University (PUCRS), Porto Alegre, RS, Brazil. I hold a PhD degree in Computer Science from the University of Victoria, Victoria, BC, Canada. I also hold both a Master and a Bachelor degree in Computer Science from PUCRS. In addition to my teaching and research experience, I have worked as a Software Quality Assurance Analyst at Dell Inc. At Dell, I was involved in auditing projects and defining software processes. In partnership with Microsoft Brazil and ISD Brazil, I co-managed the CMMI-3 Project at PUCRS. The project goal was to define software processes for small organizations following the CMMI Level 3 practices. Learn more about me and my professional experience here! Â Â
